metadata.title: Yoga Studio Location in Chiang Mai
metadata.description: Find the OneClass Yoga studio in Chiang Mai Old Town. Private yoga classes in a quiet, airy venue with mats and props provided.

title: Location
description: Private classes take place in a semi-open venue in the heart of Chiang Mai's Old Town, offering a quiet and airy environment, perfect for focused yoga sessions.

features.title: Private Class Features
items: Venue rental included (normally 500 THB per 1.5-hour session)
Quiet surroundings in the center of Old Town

address.title: Address
address.text: Rachadamnoen Rd Soi 5, Tambon Si Phum, Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai 50200
